name: projekt_iot
description: This project delivers a robust solution by integrating real-time hardware weather monitoring (via ESP32 micro-controller) with a Machine Learning (ML) model for predictive analytics. The entire system is packaged as a web application, providing users with an aesthetic, browser-based Graphical User Interface (GUI).
author: Bartosz Baran, Wojciech Mycek, Piotr Mania
